rfid.descripcion: Radiofrequency identification system for quick and secure access, with personalized cards for residents and vehicles.

faceId.descripcion: Advanced facial recognition for contactless identity verification, with high accuracy and processing speed.

huellaDigital.descripcion: Biometric authentication via fingerprint for greater security in critical access points.

fotomultas.descripcion: Automated infraction detection system with image capture and automatic ticket generation.

novedades.descripcion: Stay informed about the latest updates and important news of the neighborhood through notifications and a real-time news section.

infracciones.descripcion: Manage and view registered violations and receive instant notifications.

encuestas.descripcion: Participate in community surveys, vote on important decisions, and view real-time results to improve community life.

reservas.descripcion: Integrated system to book common spaces, sports fields, and event rooms with instant confirmation.

denuncias.descripcion: Direct channel to report incidents or situations requiring attention.

visitas.descripcion: Manage guest entries in advance, generate QR codes for quick access, and keep a guest log.

expensas.descripcion: Check and download your monthly expense receipts and keep a record of your payments.

documentos.descripcion: Access important documents, regulations, and other files shared by management.

informarPago.descripcion: Quickly and easily report your payments for expenses or services, attaching receipts if necessary.

correspondencia.descripcion: Receive notifications about the arrival of mail or packages.

guiaBarrial.descripcion: Find and share recommendations for services and places of interest with the community.

consultas.descripcion: Send your questions and receive direct advice from management and/or security.

familia.descripcion: Manage your family members, including their access and permissions within the community.

IngresoYegreso.descripcion: Efficient control of entries and exits with automatic registration, identity verification, and real-time alerts.

GestionDeInvitados.descripcion: Complete system to manage visitors, with pre-registration, data validation, and stay tracking.

BuscarUsuarios.descripcion: Advanced search for residents and visitors with custom filters and quick access to relevant information.

Correspondencia.descripcion: Comprehensive management of parcels and correspondence with automatic notifications and delivery logs.

Registros.descripcion: Detailed log system with a full history of operations and custom report generation.

ControlDeAcceso.descripcion: Centralized management of all access points with real-time monitoring and barrier control.

SobreNosotros.descripcion: Hard Stack is formed by the best students of computer science and computing. Our team possesses extensive knowledge in hardware, software, PC assembly, and application development. We are a passionate and cohesive group, committed to serving the community through our skills in the field of computing.

SecurityFocus.title: Security Focus
SecurityFocus.description: Security Focus is an innovative project developed by the agency Hardstack to optimize security and management of gated communities. This comprehensive system combines various advanced technologies to ensure effective access control and security.

Tecnolog√≠aAvanzada.title: Advanced Technology
Tecnolog√≠aAvanzada.description: We incorporate RFID, Face ID, and speed cameras for efficient access control.

SeguridadIntegral.title: Comprehensive Security
SeguridadIntegral.description: Robust systems developed with Python for complete neighborhood protection.

GestionSimplificada.title: Simplified Management
GestionSimplificada.description: Mobile apps in React Native and a Windows Forms interface for easy and efficient management.

SoporteEspecializado.title: Specialized Support
SoporteEspecializado.description: We offer personalized assistance to ensure the optimal operation of our system.

AltaConfiabilidad.title: High Reliability
AltaConfiabilidad.description: Our infrastructure based on SQL and Prisma ensures high availability and reliability.
